title: Always in dark mode
body: **Issue:** Even if you have your Windows in light mode, the app will always open in dark mode with no option to change it. Not sure if this is by design, but I thought it might have been a bug since choosing either Acrylic or Mica should follow system settings.
author: lexcyn

comments.body: It's by design. I will implement the white mode.

title: virus detection
body: Was interested in trying this, but it's detected as a virus by Norton.
author: hspindel

comments.body: False positive. Build the project yourself and it likely won't detect it as such.

title: Pihole - Version 6 Support
body:
Hey,

i think this only supports V5?

V6 is using different API paths and logic, so it doesnt work on my V6.
author: FurkanVG

comments.body: Hi, It only support V5 at the moment!
:( im sad. Cool tool! Tho i would consider adding V6 Support, since it will be slowly out of development and will go to prod (tho this will prb still take few months prb)
I will support V6 in the future! :)
